name: Museum Heist
description:
Your mission: Sneak into the well-guarded museum and get the target treasure in hand.

The museum is protected by patrol guards, hide yourself in time! There are also many tricks, use your wisdom to solve them.

Complete your mission and collect as many treasures as you can!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anytime anywhere
* Addictive puzzle game, try it harder to solve the impossible mission.
* You will get chances to escape from the guards or tricks, use them wisely.
* Collect all the treasures and to be the Who Never Missed
